result.execSummary:
The defendant Valencia D Coney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: No contact with the Oshkosh B'gosh store.

Submit a DNA sample, Court waived the DNA surcharge due to the defendant's inability to pay.
Pay costs and surcharges in the total amount of $150.00 due by 12/20/2016.  If not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Valencia D Coney

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Defendant Valencia D Coney in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 4.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 20, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Valencia D Coney in court with attorney Zoe Everett.  Michael Jerome Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Counsel is newly appointed on this matter.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for May 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Valencia D Coney in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation but has not yet been appointed counsel.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Any Oshkosh B'Gosh and Mayfair Collection.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Valencia D Coney in court.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office.  Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible.  The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br. 04.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Valencia D Coney
Current: 3722 West Brown Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208   (Effective: 03-22-2016)
Prior: 3422 West Brown Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Valencia D Coney not in court.  Bruce J. Landgraf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 2-3-2016 at 1:30pm
